title: No more than 14 parallel RDP connections possible
author: messefilme
body_snippet: I'm using mRemoteNG to connect to Servers using RDP protocol. Sometimes it is required to Login to many Servers at the same time. These Servers are stored inside a SQL database for mRemoteNG instead of using a configuration file. Due to problems between the current stable Version of mRemoteNG and SQL I installed the latest Version which came with a bugfix for SQL Connections. But on the other Hand it seems that this Version does not handle more than 14 parallel Connections. When trying to establ...

comments.author: gentoouser
comments.snippet: I am having issues too where I have to close connections or restart mRemoteNG to get a new connection to work. Also it seems like you can not open alot of new session at one.

comments.author: nonamezane
comments.snippet: I'm also having this issue.  I get a "blank" credential box on the 15th RDP connection.  That connection and any subsequent attempt fails.  Closing and restarting mremoteng allows me to create new RDP sessions.

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet:
I'm not sure if it's related, though I had a similar bug where I was unable to connect another RDP session, and I assumed this was caused due to memory limitiations (I observed mRemoteNG using multible GBs of memory while connecting with a 4K screen). This might be a thing to consider when debugging, unfortunately I don't have enough servers reachable right now to test that again.

FYI I'm running 1.76.20.24615

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet: As I though this might be related to issue #854, #864 and #910, which is intended to be solved with an x64 Build of this Software (see #915). Just keep this in mind
